welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kopervik, a charming coastal town known for its picturesque landscapes and rich maritime heritage. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our beautiful city, and we hope you enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Haugesund Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Haugesund Airport is responsible for handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sola Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Sola Airport handles all domestic flights within Norway.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The international terminal at Sola Airport serves all international flights from and to Norway.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
